text: The Serpent Only Lies is the eleventh studio album by the American sludge metal band Crowbar. It was released on October 28, 2016, through eOne Music. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== ===Crowbar=== * Kirk Windstein – vocals, rhythm guitar, bass, production * Matt Brunson – lead guitar * Tommy Buckley – drums ===Technical personnel=== * Duane Simoneaux – production, mixing ==References== Category:Crowbar (American band) albums Category:2016 albums Category:E1 Music albums
title: The Serpent Only Lies
